title: Inactivity Notification
body:
Hi ! 
I have the ''Inactivity Notification'' for my solo/duo rank and I'm diamond 5. It says that in days I'm going to lose lp, but the solo/duo rank is not activated. I want to know if I'm going to get demoted ? 
Thank you :)

replies.body: These notifications are just that, and won't have any outcome on your current progress.  Per our [Preseason FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231832207-Preseason-FAQ), inactivity and decay are absolutely disabled during the preseason.  I hope that helps bring some ease!
